CancelQuery.name: CancelQuery
CancelQuery.description: Grants permission to cancel a query

CreateMLEndpoint.description: Grants permission to create an ML endpoint

DeleteDataViaQuery.name: DeleteDataViaQuery
DeleteDataViaQuery.description: Grants permission to run delete data via query APIs on database

DeleteMLEndpoint.name: DeleteMLEndpoint
DeleteMLEndpoint.description: Grants permission to delete an ML endpoint

DeleteStatistics.name: DeleteStatistics
DeleteStatistics.description: Grants permission to delete all the statistics in the database

GetEngineStatus.name: GetEngineStatus
GetEngineStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of the Neptune engine

GetGraphSummary.name: GetGraphSummary
GetGraphSummary.description: Grants permission to get the graph summary from the database

GetLoaderJobStatus.name: GetLoaderJobStatus
GetLoaderJobStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of a loader job

GetMLDataProcessingJobStatus.name: GetMLDataProcessingJobStatus
GetMLDataProcessingJobStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of an ML data processing job

GetMLEndpointStatus.name: GetMLEndpointStatus
GetMLEndpointStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of an ML endpoint

GetMLModelTrainingJobStatus.name: GetMLModelTrainingJobStatus
GetMLModelTrainingJobStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of an ML model training job

GetMLModelTransformJobStatus.name: GetMLModelTransformJobStatus
GetMLModelTransformJobStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of an ML model transform job

GetQueryStatus.name: GetQueryStatus
GetQueryStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of all active queries

GetStatisticsStatus.name: GetStatisticsStatus
GetStatisticsStatus.description: Grants permission to check the status of statistics of the database

GetStreamRecords.name: GetStreamRecords
GetStreamRecords.description: Grants permission to fetch stream records from Neptune

ListLoaderJobs.name: ListLoaderJobs
ListLoaderJobs.description: Grants permission to list all the loader jobs

ListMLEndpoints.description: Grants permission to list all the ML endpoints

ListMLModelTrainingJobs.description: Grants permission to list all the ML model training jobs

ListMLModelTransformJobs.name: ListMLModelTransformJobs
ListMLModelTransformJobs.description: Grants permission to list all the ML model transform jobs

ManageStatistics.description: Grants permission to manage statistics in the database

ReadDataViaQuery.name: ReadDataViaQuery
ReadDataViaQuery.description: Grants permission to run read data via query APIs on database

ResetDatabase.name: ResetDatabase
ResetDatabase.description: Grants permission to get the token needed for reset and resets the Neptune database

StartLoaderJob.description: Grants permission to start a loader job

StartMLDataProcessingJob.description: Grants permission to start an ML data processing job

StartMLModelTrainingJob.description: Grants permission to start an ML model training job

StartMLModelTransformJob.description: Grants permission to start an ML model transform job

WriteDataViaQuery.description: Grants permission to run write data via query APIs on database

connect.name: connect
connect.description: Grants permission to all data-access actions in engine versions prior to 1.2.0.0
